title: [Large-Scale] Protein Thermal Stability Regulation Education Course Utilizing Molecular Dynamics Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary biochemistry and protein structure knowledge, basic computer application skills
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals focusing on applying complex scientific concepts to real-world problem-solving, with a hands-on curriculum utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze residues affecting protein thermal stability using molecular dynamics simulation tools
Learners can quantitatively evaluate protein conformational stability through RMSD calculations
Learners can design rational residue substitution strategies to enhance protein thermal stability based on MD simulation results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
